description: This application is the Smart Extension of « Lunar Phase » for your Android Wear watch.It includes both the classic application and extensions that allows you to display the views on your watch.The settings are those of the classic Widget :- Location : determined by wireless networks, GPS or bookmarkClick on the icon to start the application in fullscreen mode on your watch. Tap on screen to switch between the available views. Long press to quit and to go back home.
descriptionHTML:
This application is the Smart Extension of « Lunar Phase » for your Android Wear watch.

It includes both the classic application and extensions that allows you to display the views on your watch.

The settings are those of the classic Widget :
- Location : determined by wireless networks, GPS or bookmark

Click on the icon to start the application in fullscreen mode on your watch. Tap on screen to switch between the available views. Long press to quit and to go back home.
comments: Great app Even my husband was impressed and it takes a lot to impress him. My problem is that it's hard to exit out of because it all swipes to the next tab. Regardless it is great for an early tech.

Lunar Phase Application This Lunar Phase Application For My ALCATEL ANDROID SMARTPHONE IS ABSOLUTELY PERFECT APPLICATION IT'S ABSOLUTELY ACCURATE AS SEEING FROM MY CURRENT LOCATION I DEFINITELY GIVE YOU 5 STARS *****
Forgettable face, amazing mind Forget the watch face. The value here is the INCREDIBLY detailed app. Best moon and sun gazing app ever.
Great app Great app for keeping up with lunar movements. Great support from developer too.
recentChanges: Technical update and bug fixed for Android 7.X.
